name: Horrific Horror
description:
Horrific Horror is a FPS-Horror game created with FPS creator.

My name David Eagle. I'm a scientist and I believe in human experimentation. Prisoners deserve to be experimented on, and be useful to society at least once. I work with two other scientists, Mike Hawk and Andrew Allen. I mostly work with Mike Hawk since I'm mostly stuck in his lab, but it's great to work with Andrew Allen more since he can make greater advancements than Mike and I both. Mike and I created a virus that makes prisoners go insane, but thanks to Mike laziness, he became infected too. Now I need to escape his lab and get to Andrew as soon as possible.

The music was created by Danny Baranowsky.
